instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Angry
input: WTF! Your machine just stole my 1983 TZS! Give it back NOW!

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Furious
input: This is robbery! I paid for Money deducted but no credits shown on machine and got nothing! I want my money back immediately!

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Raging
input: I am tired of this broken app! 4068 TZS gone for nothing! Fix your App crashed during transaction processing!

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Impatient
input: Hurry up and fix this. I paid and the machine is stuck on Duplicate charge for a single session. My time is money!

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Demanding
input: Refund my 1246 TZS immediately. The Wrong amount deducted from wallet failed and I won't wait.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Polite
input: Excuse me, I encountered an issue with Network timeout after payment confirmation. Could you please check my transaction?

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Respectful
input: Dear Support, I believe there was an error during my payment of 2913 TZS. Thank you for your help.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Patient
input: Hello, I'm waiting at the kiosk and it seems No receipt generated after successful payment happened. No rush, but please look into it.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Grateful
input: Thanks for the app, but Coin slot jammed during credit update just occurred. I'm sure you can fix it. 3321 TZS was deducted.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Apologetic
input: Sorry to bother, I might have done something wrong but the Connection lost between app and kiosk failed after payment.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Technical
input: Observed a 408 Timeout during QR code scan timeout. Transaction state is 'pending' but debit confirmed.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Analytical
input: The logs indicate Money deducted but no credits shown on machine at 14:00. Sync failed between Supabase and the local machine.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Precise
input: Transaction ID SK-12 failed. Amount: 755. Reason: App crashed during transaction processing. Lat/Long confirmed.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Formal
input: I am writing to report a discrepancy regarding Duplicate charge for a single session. Please find the attached details.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Professional
input: A payment failure was detected at Location 14. Issue: Wrong amount deducted from wallet. Please escalate.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Confused
input: I'm not sure what happened... I paid but the machine says Network timeout after payment confirmation? What do I do?

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Puzzled
input: Wait, the money is gone but the screen is blank? Is Payment successful but machine didn't unlock a common thing?

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Uncertain
input: Maybe I scanned it wrong? It says No receipt generated after successful payment but my bank says paid. Help?

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Lost
input: I'm stuck here. Paid 4521 and it just shows Coin slot jammed during credit update. Is anyone there?

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Vague
input: It didn't work. Something about Connection lost between app and kiosk. Sort it out.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Urgent
input: CRITICAL: Payment failed during QR code scan timeout! I need this machine working NOW!

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Panicked
input: Oh no! My last 4412 TZS is gone and the machine is broken! Please help me!

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Immediate
input: Process this refund NOW. App crashed during transaction processing blocked my transaction.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Desperate
input: I really need those credits. Paid 5381 but Duplicate charge for a single session happened. Please, I'm begging.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Alarmed
input: Wait! Why did it charge me twice for Wrong amount deducted from wallet?! Stop the payment!

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Sarcastic
input: Wow, great job. Stole my money and gave me Network timeout after payment confirmation instead of credits. Amazing.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Cynical
input: Another day, another Payment successful but machine didn't unlock. I guess this is how you make your profit?

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Mocking
input: Is this a "Smart" kiosk or a "Stupid" one? Because No receipt generated after successful payment isn't very smart.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Ironical
input: How ironic. The "Reliable" app just failed with Coin slot jammed during credit update on my first try.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Passive-Aggressive
input: It's fine, I didn't need that 1186 TZS anyway. I'm sure Connection lost between app and kiosk is a feature.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Frustrated
input: Ugh! Not again! QR code scan timeout is ruining my day. Just fix it!

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Annoyed
input: This is so annoying. Every time I use this, Money deducted but no credits shown on machine happens.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Disappointed
input: I expected better. Paid 4643 and was met with App crashed during transaction processing. Sad.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Exhausted
input: I'm tired of calling support for Duplicate charge for a single session. Just make the app work.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Fed up
input: I'm done with this. Wrong amount deducted from wallet every single time. Give me my money back.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Brief
input: Paid 981. Network timeout after payment confirmation. Refund.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Concise
input: Payment failed at Payment successful but machine didn't unlock. Transaction SK-20260236. Fix.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Short
input: No receipt generated after successful payment error. Money gone. Help.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Direct
input: My payment of 1119 failed due to Coin slot jammed during credit update. Refund required.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Minimalist
input: Connection lost between app and kiosk. Fail. 3934.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Descriptive
input: I arrived at the kiosk, scanned the code, confirmed the 1572 TZS payment on my phone, but then the screen just hung on QR code scan timeout.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Elaborate
input: After a long day, I tried to use the machine. The QR code loaded slowly, I paid, and then instead of credits, a Money deducted but no credits shown on machine message appeared.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Detailed
input: Location: Dar Central. Time: 15:30. Amount: 4082. Issue: App crashed during transaction processing after M-Pesa confirmation.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Narrative
input: So I was standing there, the sun was hot, and I just wanted to use the machine. I paid, but then Duplicate charge for a single session happened and now I'm here.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Circumstantial
input: Given the low signal at this spot, it seems Wrong amount deducted from wallet occurred during the callback phase of my 3267 payment.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Threatening
input: Refund me now or I'm taking this to the police. This is fraud. Network timeout after payment confirmation is a lie.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Legalistic
input: Pursuant to the consumer rights act, I demand an immediate reversal of the 3781 TZS charged during Payment successful but machine didn't unlock.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Intimidating
input: You don't want to mess with me. Give me my credits or my money. No receipt generated after successful payment is your problem, not mine.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Stern
input: This failure is unacceptable. Coin slot jammed during credit update must be resolved immediately. No excuses.

instruction: Analyze the SmartKiosk user complaint and generate a structured support ticket. Tone: Aggressive
input: Fix this Connection lost between app and kiosk SHIT right now or I'll break the machine!
